name: Proc Rogue
description:
WASD/ZQSD : Move
Space : Attack
CTRL : Dash + invulnerability
R : Restart ( Spam it a bit in the starting room to check out the map and room proc gen ;))

A prototype melee focused isaac-like roguelite, made in collaboration with the great jlowther (art)! Made in 5 days.
Try to clear the whole floor. Don't forget you have a dash.
Way too low in content right now (Come on, what's a roguelite without powerups!) but I think it's a good base :)

PS: Naga enemy was added last minute, please ignore its bugs ;).

Procedural :
